description: An IOS application makes travel easier, cheaper, and more economical.
title: Duck Duck Ride IOS Mobile App

content.content: Our inspiration for building Duck Duck Ride stemmed from the desire to create an app that allows people to travel to new places at a cheaper cost. We realized that transportation expenses can be burdensome, especially for students and people who don't have access to a car. With Duck Duck Ride, we aim to make travel more accessible, affordable, and environmentally friendly.

content.title: innerContent
content: Assisted teammates for frontend React-Native development :
Written API document of how to use backend Restful APIs
Adjusted CSS style for the app

content.title: innerContent
content: Implemented backend server with Express and NodeJS. MongoDB for database, MVC structure, RESTful APIs :
Created serveral routers for different APIs
Different MVN layers handling each job
Used libraries like latitude & longitude distance calculation to communicate with Google Map API
APIs can talked with MongoDB using Mongoose

content.content: Constructed a dynamic application wihthin 36 hours and got more than 20 visitors' like in Hackathon.

content.title: innerConclusion
content.content:
I learned a lot for preparing this project. I spent a lot of time of Express, NodeJS, MongoDB, and so on. During the development, I find designing the structure is the most important thing. A good structrue helps seperated codes and beaviours, which makes the whole backend APIs clear, much easier to understand.
Also, I spent a lot of time thinking how the database should be like. A basic database must able to satisfy the requirements of storage. However, A good database is both easy to use and more extendable. I learned a lot in designing databases during the development. Although my design might not be the best, I will keep study!
